TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebResourceAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WebResourceAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WebResourceAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义在程序集中启用嵌入资源的元数据特性。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute that enables an embedded resource in an assembly.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 仅当对程序集声明使用时， 类才有效。The class is valid only when used on assembly declarations. 它用于启用程序集中指定的嵌入资源，以用作 Web 资源。It is used to enable a specified embedded resource in an assembly for use as a Web resource. 有关资源的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 网页资源概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd)。For more information on resources, see [ASP.NET Web Page Resources Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 特性应用于定义自定义控件 `MyCustomControl`的命名空间。The first code example demonstrates how to apply the attribute to a namespace that defines a custom control, `MyCustomControl`. 第二个代码示例演示如何在网页中使用 `MyCustomControl` 类。The second code example demonstrates how to use the `MyCustomControl` class in a Web page. 下面的代码示例演示如何对自定义程序集应用 特性，以定义图像 Web 资源和 HTML Web 资源。The following code example demonstrates how to apply the attribute on a custom assembly to define an image Web resource and an HTML Web resource. `MyCustomControl` 类定义一个复合控件，该控件使用资源来设置复合控件中包含的 控件的 属性的值，并设置链接到 HTML 资源的 控件的 属性。The `MyCustomControl` class defines a composite control that uses the resources to set the value of the property of an control that is contained within the composite control and to set the property of an control linking to the HTML resource. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/cs/WebResourceAttribute.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/vb/WebResourceAttribute.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在网页中使用 `MyCustomControl` 类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `MyCustomControl` class in a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/cs/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/vb/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)] 此示例要求您编译包含 `MyCustomControl`的程序集的 Image1 和 Help .htm 资源。This example requires that you compile the Image1.jpg and Help.htm resources with the assembly that contains `MyCustomControl`. 有关详细信息，请参阅、 [/resource （ C# 编译器选项）](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/resource-compiler-option)或[/resource （Visual Basic）](/dotnet/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/resource)。For more information, see, [/resource (C# Compiler Options)](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/resource-compiler-option) or [/resource (Visual Basic)](/dotnet/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/resource). 下面显示了可在此示例中使用的 HTML Web 资源的示例。An example of an HTML Web resource that could be used in this example is shown next. 请注意使用 `WebResource` 语法，这是在将 属性设置为 Web 资源 `true` 时使用的。Note the use of the `WebResource` syntax, which is used when you set the property to `true` for a Web resource. `` `` `` `Included Help Page` `` `` `
` ` />` `Included help file.` `
` `` ``

span.span: ASP.NET Web Page Resources Overview
Resources in Applications

related.span: /resource （将资源文件嵌入到输出）（ C# 编译器选项）

span.span: /resource (Embed Resource File to Output) (C# Compiler Options)
/resource (Visual Basic)
Packaging and Deploying Resources

summary.span: 获取或设置其中包含 Web 资源的内容分发网络 (CDN) 的路径。

span.span: Gets or set the path of a Content Delivery Network (CDN) that contains Web resources.

value.span: 内容分发网络 (CDN) 的路径。

span.span: The path of a Content Delivery Network (CDN).

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值向 指示在使用 HTTPS 访问页时是否应使用到内容分发网络 (CDN) 路径的安全连接来访问脚本资源。

span.span: Gets or set a value that indicates to the whether a script resource should be accessed using a secure connection to the content delivery network (CDN) path when the page is accessed using HTTPS.

value.span: 如果应使用 HTTPS 访问 CDN，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the CDN should be accessed using HTTPS; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性检查 是否应使用安全连接（使用 SSL）访问关联的脚本资源。Use the property to check whether the associated script resource should be accessed by the using a secure connection (using SSL) to a CDN. 通过使用 属性，当 Web 应用程序尝试从支持 SSL 的 CDN 请求安全内容时，你可以避免来自浏览器的警告消息。By using the property, you can avoid a warning message from the browser when your Web application attempts to request secure content from a CDN that supports SSL.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentType As String
public: property System::String ^ ContentType { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串包含由 类引用的资源的 MIME 类型。

span.span: Gets a string containing the MIME type of the resource that is referenced by the class.
The content type of the resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容类型的示例 `"image/jpeg"` 和 `"text/xml"`。Examples of content types are `"image/jpeg"` and `"text/xml"`. 有关 MIME 类型的详细信息，请访问[Internet 号码分配机构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=43988)网站，并参阅有关媒体类型的部分。For more information on MIME types, go to the [Internet Assigned Numbers Authority](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=43988) Web site and refer to the section on media types. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何查询 属性的值。The following code example demonstrates how to query the value of the property. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/cs/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/vb/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets an expression that is used when a Web resource has successfully loaded.

span.span: An expression that is used when a Web resource has successfully loaded.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值确定在处理由 类引用的嵌入资源的过程中是否分析其他 Web 资源 URL，并使用该资源的完整路径替换。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that determines whether, during processing of the embedded resource referenced by the class, other Web resource URLs are parsed and replaced with the full path to the resource.

value.span: 如果在对资源的处理过程中解析嵌入式资源，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if embedded resources are resolved during processing of the resource; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在将资源从程序集传输到响应时，如果 属性设置为 `true`，则在此时可以解析对嵌入资源中的其他 Web 资源的引用。When a resource is streamed from the assembly to the response, references to other Web resources in the embedded resources can be resolved at this time, if the property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何查询 属性的值。The following code example demonstrates how to query the value of the property. 在此示例中，HTML 文件 Help .htm 的 属性定义为 属性设置为 "`true`"。In this example, the attribute of the HTML file Help.htm is defined with the property set to `true`. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/cs/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/vb/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)] 下面显示了可在此示例中使用的 HTML Web 资源的示例。An example of an HTML Web resource that could be used in this example is shown next. 请注意，将 属性设置为资源 `true` 时，将使用 `WebResource` 语法。Note that the `WebResource` syntax is used when you set the property to `true` for the resource. `` `` `` `Included Help Page` `` `` `
` ` />` `Included help file.` `
` `` ``
